page_content: Discusses the digital transformation of tax filing, including the use of TaxMe-Online software.
Discusses traffic restrictions due to a women's cycling race in the Bern region.
Discusses various types of taxable and non-taxable income.
Discusses how to use Valoren or ISIN numbers to search for investment details with ictax.
Provides information on how to submit personal contact details for tax-related inquiries.
